title: Following the Sun: A Bicycle Pilgrimage From Andalusia to the Hebrides
description: An account of the New England Booksellers' Award-winning writer's 1,500-mile journey on bicycle from the port of Cadiz to the Arctic Circle documents his sun-drenched adventures through southern Spain, Bordeaux, Versailles, Wordsworth's Lake District, precipitous Scottish Highlands, and a Druid temple.
author: John Hanson Mitchell
